text: Albrecht Wellmer (9 July 1933 – 13 September 2018) was a German philosopher. He worked at the Freie Universität Berlin. Wellmer was born in Bergkirchen, Germany. He was an assistant to Jürgen Habermas at the University of Frankfurt from 1966 to 1970. He has held Professorships at the Universität Konstanz, the New School for Social Research and at the Freie Universität Berlin. Wellmer died on 13 September 2018 at the age of 85.Albrecht Wellmer, Erbe der Frankfurter Schule ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:German philosophers Category:Academics of Goethe University Frankfurt
title: Albrecht Wellmer
